name: Ms . Priyanga J
about:
Hi! I'm Priyanga J, a passionate 3rd-year B.E student in Computer Science and Engineering at Al-Ameen Engineering College, Erode.

I have a strong interest in machine learning, deep learning, data science and data analytics. My goal is to leverage AI technologies to solve real-world problems efficiently. I enjoy working on projects related to data science, predictive modeling, and AI-driven applications.

projects.title: Medical Chatbot (Ongoing)
projects.description: Training a medical chatbot to provide basic health-related advice.

projects.title: Assistant Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an interactive chatbot showcased on Engineers Day at Al-Ameen Engineering College

projects.title: Insurance Eligibility Finder
projects.description: Creating a system to determine insurance eligibility using their salary and other pays.
